page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: Pre-school education is provided by a privately owned nursery school located in farm premises and organised by the farmer's wife. { Broadwell C.of E. Primary School,} housed in the original 1868 buildings, has 27 pupils aged from 4 to 11 years. Most of the children of Adlestrop and Oddington villages attend Bledington County Primary School. 11 year old pupils are transferred to Chipping Campden Comprehensive School, Bourton Vale Secondary School or Westwood's Grammar School at Northleach.
